notABank.title: You will love to pay online!
notABank.text: A safe and secure environment for your internet transactions anywhere in the world

physical.title: A free virtual card in less than 2 minutes
physical.text: Endless possibilities to buy anywhere in the world with 0 commission fees on your transactions

transfer.text1: Simplify your transactions by paying with your PayQin account free of charge
transfer.text2: Make international transfers free of charge in just a few clicks with your phone number

crypto.title: Buy and Sell Crypto
crypto.text: PayQin is the fastest app to buy and sell Bitcoin and Ethereum

cryptoDoc.title: Download PayQin now!
cryptoDoc.text: Pay and receive your payments anywhere in the world.

payment.title: Send and Receive Online Payment
payment.text: Sell online in African currencies with our Checkout. Implement our checkout and start selling

sales.title: Track Your Sales in Africa
sales.text: Sales report, Real-time transaction monitoring, 0 commission fees on sales

integration.title: Integrate the PayQin Payment Method
integration.text: Integrate our Payment Method to reach out Million Users in Multiple Countries

wordpress.title: Wordpress Plugin
wordpress.text: Download the wordpress plugin to integrate the PayQin payment gateway in your website

creation.title: Free Visa PayQin card
creation.text1: no fees for reloading and withdrawing from the card
creation.text2: no fees on all card transactions

left.text1: 5 dollars credit offer inside the card
left.text3: No fees for reloading and withdrawing from the card
left.text5: Reloading and withdrawal fees from the PayQin account - 2%

right.amount: 2000 XOF /month - 1st Month Free - Free virtuals cards
right.text3: No fees for reloading and withdrawing from the card
right.text5: Reloading and withdrawal of the PayQin account free of charge up to 100,000 XOF and above 1%

modal.title: Create Account
modal.text: To create a payqin account, download the mobile app  on IOS or Android
